about_the_game:
After a cosmic expedition disaster, you are the sole surviving astronaut stranded on Tarvos, an unknown, uncharted moon.

What initially appears to be a hospitable environment quickly reveals its true, nightmarish nature.

Your mission is to survive the hostile surface of Tarvos and uncover secrets that might help you escape. Face hordes of monsters, explore mysterious locations, and find your way to an abandoned laboratory that might hold the answers... and your only chance to return home.

Key Features

  • Unforgettable Atmosphere of Horror:

Dark locations, eerie sounds, and unpredictable threats will draw you into a claustrophobic nightmare on an alien moon.

  • Combat with Monster Hordes:

Face a variety of enemies, from small mutants to terrifying beasts that will test your survival skills.

  • Exploration and Survival Puzzle:

Gather resources, upgrade your equipment, and develop skills to meet escalating challenges.

  • Unravel Mysteries:

Find crew logs, traces of previous missions, and uncover the real reason behind the crash. Is anyone else alive?

Story and Motivation

Why did your expedition crash? Was it a mistake, or did someone deliberately condemn you to death? Every step on Tarvos brings you closer to the truth — the question is, do you have enough time to survive?

content_descriptors.notes: Expect gruesome moments and a horror atmosphere. Jumpscares may appear, along with intense moments of anxiety.
